column1: Lebuh SPA (Sungai Udang–Paya Rumput–Ayer Keroh Highway)
column2: Federal Route 33 (formerly Malacca State Route M17)
column3: is a major highway in Malacca state
column4: Malaysia. This 23.1 km (14.4 mile) highway connects Sungai Udang in the west to Ayer Keroh in the east.

column1: The Kilometre Zero of the Federal Route 33 starts from Sungai Udang.
Construction began in 2002 and was completed in 2005. In 2010
column2: the highway was gazetted as the federal roads by JKR as Federal Route 33.

column1: This highway features fast lane-to-slow lane U-turns.

column2: the SPA Highway was built under the JKR R5 road standard as a dual-carriageway highway with partial access control
column3: allowing maximum speed limit of up to 90 km/h.
